product_name: Scarpa Mai Tai Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Scarpa Mai Tai Shoes can be worn from downtown to mountain town to funky town, offering sneaker-inspired style with outdoor-inspired ruggedness. Suede leather uppers give reliable support and dependable performance; close-to-toe lacing delivers a snug, custom fit. Discreet rubber randing and reinforced toe caps protect uppers from abrasion and help improve longevity. Recycled polyester linings wick moisture away from your feet to help keep them dry and comfortable. Dual-density EVA midsoles offer lightweight support and cushioning for all-day wear. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on the Scarpa Mai Tai Shoes offer versatile traction. Closeout.
short_description: The Scarpa Mai Tai Shoes can be worn from downtown to mountain town to funky town, offering sneaker-inspired style with outdoor-inspired ruggedness.
